content: Surprised not to see more people ranking all the movies instead of just saying their opinions on one or two of then. For me it’s: 1.Fast Five 2.The Fast & the Furious 3.Fast & Furious 6 4.Fast & Furious 5.2 Fast 2 Furious 6.Tokyo Drift (I haven’t seen Furious 7 yet but I’m guessing it’ll be top 3 for me) The fact that they’re doing an 8th movie without Paul Walker (& a 9th & 10th) leaves a bad taste in my mouth. Don’t think I’ll watch those. Just seems totally unnecessary. Especially when 7 was marketed as “one last ride”. Should’ve just ended it there.
